```{r}
results_forests_01 <- compare_forests(data_01$X, data_01$W, data_01$Y, 50)
results_forests_01$compare <- "0 vs 1"
results_forests_02 <- compare_forests(data_02$X, data_02$W, data_02$Y, 50)
results_forests_02$compare <- "0 vs 2"
results_forests_03 <- compare_forests(data_03$X, data_03$W, data_03$Y, 50)
results_forests_03$compare <- "0 vs 3"
results_forests <- Reduce(rbind, list(results_forests_01, 
                                      results_forests_02, 
                                      results_forests_03))
```
